pages.text: Ender Storage adds new Ender Chests and Ender Tanks to your world, providing a secure and customizable way to store items and fluids. Access your storage from anywhere, even across dimensions!

Key Features: - Ender Chests: Store items and access them from any other Ender Chest with the same color code. - Ender Tanks: Store fluids and access them from any other Ender Tank with the same color code.
Customization and Security: - Change the color code by right-clicking the wool pads with dye. - Add a diamond to the latch for extra security, linking it to your player.
